=== xfce4-sensors-plugin ===

* last release seems OK, but I can't really test it on my computer
* .deb <nowiki>[[http://gauvain.tuxfamily.org/ubuntu/inprogress/xfce-goodies/xfce4-sensors-plugin_0.9.0-0ubuntu1_i386.deb|is available]]</nowiki> for x86

=== xfce4-verve-plugin ===

* verve-plugin 0.1.1 has a bug that doesn't allow to resize it
* the pkge has been generated from svn version
* svn version has more po files then the released tarball
* the tarball has been generted using "make dist"
* version 0.2 will be released soon (let's wait)
* veriosn 0.2 released, pkge ready.
* fixed orig.tar.gz name

=== xfce4-battery-plugin ===

* Package is ready but it needs to be tested on a laptop
* .deb archive for x86 <nowiki>[[http://gauvain.tuxfamily.org/ubuntu/inprogress/xfce-goodies/xfce4-battery-plugin_0.4.0-0ubuntu1_i386.deb|is available]]</nowiki>
** -- Nomed : working fine on toshiba satellite laptop

=== xfce4-xmms-plugin ===

* not in dapper 
* no new version released
* make dist-gzip missing NEWS file
